name: Access_MOUDs
proxy: Spatial access metrics to Medications for Opioid Use Disorder(MOUD) including Methadone, Buprenorphine, Naltrexone, and Opioid Treatment Providers (Distance, Travel Time, Count Within Threshold, RAAM Access Score)
source_long: U.S. Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration, Treatment Locator Tool, 2019; Vivitrol, 2020; Open Source Routing Machine, 2020
